document.full_text: new york city mayor michael bloomberg should be fined $100 million of his own money over his unpopular education chief's short and controversial tenure, a group of parents said in legal papers on wednesday.
document.title: ny parents seek $100 million from bloomberg over schools
lines_and_colors: new york city mayor michael bloomberg should be fined $100 million of his own money over his unpopular education chief's short and controversial tenure, a group of parents said in legal papers on wednesday.
